title: Ping is low, FPS normal but lag like hell
body: Title. Am i the only one with this problem ? its like all of a sudden u can't control your character and all skills you cast will only happen after like 2 sec after you press the ability and the bgm is kinda distorted. Whats happening here ? Some minion's lifebar disappear. All that happened when i have low ping and my FPS looks normal.

replies.body:
Looks like massive Packet Loss.
Could you please check here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/tools/network-logs
thanks man, i didnt create this thread and i'm not having this problem but i really appreciate you're trying to help this guy even though i dont know him, so yeah thanks man.
